read(DataInputStream) - Method in interface io.Serializable
 
read(DataInputStream) - Method in class messages.Handshake
 
read(DataInputStream) - Method in class messages.Message
 
readObject() - Method in class io.SerializableInputStream
 
RemotePeerInfo - Class in main
This Class maintains states of Remote Peers
RemotePeerInfo(int) - Constructor for class main.RemotePeerInfo
 
RemotePeerInfo(String, String, String, boolean) - Constructor for class main.RemotePeerInfo
 
Request - Class in messages
This class extends Message and provides request type request to request particular piece from peers.
Request(int) - Constructor for class messages.Request
 
run() - Method in class main.Node
1.Opens a socket connection on port 2.Instantiates the peer manager to select the k preferred neighbours and one optimistically unchoked neighbour.
run() - Method in class main.PeerContentDownloader
When unchoked, the following steps are performed: 1.randomly select a piece that is not available with the local peer and is not requested from any other peer and should be available with the remote peer.
run() - Method in class main.PeerManager
Every unchoking interval, perform following steps : calculate downloading speed in previous interval get list of interested neighbours select top k according to download speed and unchoke the choked ones among them Every optimistic unchoking interval, select a random choked and interested neighbour and unchoke it.
